footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Dehya | Update Date: 03/01/2023 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Beacon of the Reed Sea__
Her signature weapon
__Serpent Spine__
A great general statstick
__Luxurious Sea-Lord__
Event weapon providing additional damage for her Elemental Burst

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
Wolf's Gravestone, Redhorn Stonethresher, The Unforged, Skyward Pride, Blackcliff Slasher, Akuoumaru, Mailed Flower

__ Lithic Blade, The Bell__
The surprisingly viable options. 
Lithic Blade is highly difficult to build teams around, or not worth it, while The Bell is weaker even with her C1 and performs poorly on everyone else.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value:
<sands> ATK% or Energy Recharge|<goblet> Pyro DMG Bonus|<circlet> CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

If running her as a Solo Pyro, she will need around 300% Energy Recharge. 
Otherwise, she will still require 160%+.

fields.name: Substats Priority
fields.value:
CRIT DMG|CRIT Rate|Energy Recharge|ATK%|HP%

HP% isn't prioritized much, and only increases in value slightly (still less than ATK%) when you own her Constellation 1.

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Leonine Bite
**2)** Elemental Skill: Molten Inferno
**3)** Normal Attack: Sandstorm Assault

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Dispite scaling partially off HP%, Dehya does not benefit as much as you'd think from the stat. Even with constellations, she benefits much more from ATK%. *However, on 4-piece Emblem of Severed Fate, you will see her damage will be similar for an Energy Recharge or HP% sands. *

If you cannot get 2-piece ATK% sets, then you can run her with 2-piece Emblem of Severed Fate instead. 2-piece Elemental Mastery is not recommended, due to her being unable to trigger Elemental Bursts of units such as Yelan or Xingqiu.

Furthermore, sets like Vermillion Hereafter and Tenacity of the Millelith are similar in levels of DPS, but not recommended to farm for her and require setup.
